name: Vlogmations+
description:
VLOGMATIONS+

Initial Release: June 13, 2022
Current Version: v1.0.0 (Open Beta)

-----

Watch Videos offline With "Vlogmations+"!!

The App Features Videos From 3 YouTubers:

Vlogmations, Josh345 & IcecreamMcguy (More YouTubers Hopefully Coming Soon)

-----

WHAT'S NEW?

v1.0.0 (Open Beta)

- Vlogmations Collection (2 Episodes)

- Josh345 Collection (2 Episodes)

- Playback For Videos

- New Layout

- Linux Device Support

- Icecream Mcguy Collection Not Available Yet

-----

DEVICES

Android 6.0+ , Windows 7+,  MacOS, Linux
